mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.REVIEW_NO FROM ( SELECT A.MER_UID, B.PRODUCT_NAME,B.PRODUCT_PRICE, COUNT(*) AS BUY_CNT, B.PRODUCT_NO, A.ORDER_DATE FROM product_order A JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE A.USER_NO = #{userNo} GROUP BY A.MER_UID, B.PRODUCT_NAME, B.PRODUCT_NO, A.ORDER_DATE, B.PRODUCT_PRICE ORDER BY A.ORDER_DATE DESC ) A LEFT JOIN REVIEW B ON A.MER_UID = B.MER_UID AND A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO where rownum<=3 ORDER BY A.ORDER_DATE DESC
